T06vmvkbh_u:6: lakṣaṇaṃ hy āvṛtis tatvaṃ pratipakṣasya bhāvanā /
T06vmvkbh_u:7: tatra ca sthā phalaprāptir yānānuttaryam eva ca //
T06vmvkbh_u:8: ity ete saptārthā hy asmiṃ cchāstre upadiśyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:9: yad uta lakṣaṇaṃ āvaraṇaṃ tatvaṃ pratipakṣasya bhāvanā /
T06vmvkbh_u:10: tasyām eva ca pratipakṣabhāvanāyām avasthā phalaprāptiś ca yānānuttatyañ ca saptamo 'rthaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:14: śūnyatā vidyate tv atra tasyām api sa vidyate // 1.1
T06vmvkbh_u:19: tasyām api sa vidyata ity abhūtaparikalpaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:20: evaṃ yad yatra nāsti tat tena śūnyam iti yathābhūtaṃ samanupaśyati yat punar atrāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati tat sad ihāstīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty aviparītaṃ śūnyatālakṣaṇam udbhāvitaṃ bhavati na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyaṃ tasmāt sarvaṃ vidhīyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:21: satvād asatvāt satvāc ca madhyamā pratipac ca sā // I.2
T06vmvkbh_u:23: na cāśūnyaṃ dvayena grāhyena grāhakeṇa ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:26: vidhīyate nirdiśyate satvād abhūtaparikalpasya asatvād dvayasya satvāc ca śūnyatāyā abhūtaparikalpe tasyāṃ cābhūtaparikalpasya sā ca madhyamā pratipat /
T06vmvkbh_u:29: evam ayaṃ pāṭhaḥ prajñāpāramitādiṣv anulomito bhavati sarvam idaṃ na śūnyaṃ nāpi cāśūnyam iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:31: evam abhūtaparikalpasya sallakṣaṇam asallakṣaṇaṃ ca khyāpayitvā /
T06vmvkbh_u:34: vijñānaṃ nāsti cāsyārthas tadabhāvāt tad apy asat // I.3
T06vmvkbh_u:36: satvapratibhāsaṃ yat pañcendriyatvena svaparasantānayor [/] ātmapratibhāsaṃ kliṣṭaṃ manaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:38: vijñaptipratibhāsaṃ ṣaḍ vijñānāni [/] nāsti cāsyārtha iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:42: yat tadgrāhyaṃ rūpādipañcendriyaṃ manaḥ ṣaḍvijñānasaṃjñakaṃ caturvidhaṃ tasya grāhyasyārthasyābhāvāt tad api grāhakaṃ vijñānam asat /
T06vmvkbh_u:45: yasmān na tathāsya bhāvo yathā pratibhāsa utpadyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:47: bhrāntimātrasyotpādāt/ kimarthaṃ punas tasyābhāva eva neṣyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:50: anyathā na bandho na mokṣaḥ prasidhyed iti saṃkleśavyavadānāpavādadoṣaḥ syāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:52: evam abhūtaparikalpasya svalakṣaṇaṃ khyāpayitvā saṃgrahalakṣaṇaṃ khyāpayati /
T06vmvkbh_u:53: abhūtaparikalpamātre sati yathā trayāṇāṃ svabhāvānāṃ saṃgraho bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:54: kalpitaḥ paratantraś ca pariniṣpanna eva ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:55: arthād abhūtakalpāc ca dvayābhāvāc ca deśitaḥ // I.5
T06vmvkbh_u:70: tasmāc ca samatā jñeyā nopalambhopalambhayoḥ // I.7
T06vmvkbh_u:71: upalabdher upalabdhitvenāsiddhatvād abhūtārthapratibhāsatayā tūpalabdhir ity ucyate 'nupalabdhisvabhāvāpi
T06vmvkbh_u:78: tatrārthadṛṣṭir vijñānaṃ tadviśeṣe tu caitasāḥ // I.8
T06vmvkbh_u:94: pūraṇāt triparicchedād upabhogāc ca karṣaṇāt // I.10
T06vmvkbh_u:103: karṣaṇāt tṛṣṇayā karmākṣiptasya punarbhavasya [/] nibandhanād upādānair vijñānasyotpattyanukūleṣu kāmādiṣu /
T06vmvkbh_u:104: ābhimukhyād bhavena kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ punarbhave vipākadānāyābhimukhīkaraṇāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:105: duḥkhanāj jātyā jarāmaraṇena ca parikliśyate jagat /
T06vmvkbh_u:107: tredhā dvedhā ca saṃkleśaḥ saptadhābhūtakalpanāt // I.11
T06vmvkbh_u:134: piṇḍārthaḥ punar abhūtaparikalpasya navavidhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:144: evam abhūtaparikalpaṃ khyāpayitvā yathā śūnyatā vijñeyā tan nirdiśati /
T06vmvkbh_u:145: lakṣaṇaṃ cātha paryāyas tadartho bheda eva ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:146: sādhanaṃ ceti vijñeyaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsataḥ // I.12
T06vmvkbh_u:149: dvayābhāvo hy abhāvasya bhāvaḥ śūnyasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:152: lakṣaṇam ity abhāvasvabhāvalakṣaṇatvaṃ śūnyatāyāḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:159: pṛthaktve sati dharmād anyā dharmateti na yujyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:161: ekatve sati viśuddhyālambanaṃ jñānaṃ na syāt sāmānyalakṣaṇañ ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:166: dharmadhātuś ca paryāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ samāsataḥ // I.14
T06vmvkbh_u:171: ananyathārthena tathātā nityan tathaiveti kṛtvā [/] aviparyāsārthena bhūtakoṭiḥ viparyāsāvastutvāt
T06vmvkbh_u:184: yadā saha malena vartate tadā saṃkliṣṭā /
T06vmvkbh_u:186: yadi samalā bhūtvā nirmalā bhavati kathaṃ vikāradharmiṇītvād anityā na bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:187: yasmād asyāḥ abdhātukanakākāśaśuddhivac chuddhir iṣyate // I.1
T06vmvkbh_u:188: āgantukamalāpagamān na tu tasyāḥ svabhāvānyatvaṃ bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:210: tac ca yena yathā dṛṣṭaṃ yadarthaṃtasya śūnyatā // I.171
T06vmvkbh_u:211: tatra bhoktṛśūnyatā (/) ādhyātmikāny āyatanāny ārabdhā bhojanaśūnyatā bāhyāni /
T06vmvkbh_u:212: taddehas tayor bhoktṛbhojanayor yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīraṃ [/]
T06vmvkbh_u:214: pratiṣṭhāvastu bhājanalokaḥ [/] tasya vistīrṇatvāc chūnyatā mahāśūnyatety ucyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:215: tac cādhyātmikāyatanādi yena śūnyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śūnyatājñānena [/] tasya śūnyatā śūnyatāśūnyatā
T06vmvkbh_u:216: yathā ca dṛṣṭaṃ paramārthākāreṇa tasya śūnyatā paramārtha śūnyatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:217: yadarthaṃ ca bodhisatvaḥ prapadyate tasya ca śūnyatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:224: anavarāgrasya hi saṃsārasya śūnyatām apaśyan khinnaḥ saṃsāraṃ parityajeta /
T06vmvkbh_u:226: nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇe 'pi yan nāvakirati notsṛjati tasya śūnyatā (/) (Mvbh
T06vmvkbh_u:234: evan tāvac caturdaśānāṃ śūnyatānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:237: tadabhāvasya sadbhāvas tasmin sā śūnyatāparā // I.20
T06vmvkbh_u:239: tadabhāvasya ca sadbhāvaḥ [/] tasmin yathokte bhoktrādau sānyā śūnyateti [/] śūnyatālakṣaṇakhyāpanārthaṃ dvividhām ante śūnyatāṃ vyavasthāpayati /
T06vmvkbh_u:245: saṃkliṣṭā ced bhaven nāsau muktāḥ syuḥ sarvadehinaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:246: viśuddhā ced bhaven nāsau vyāyāmo niṣphalo bhavet // I.21
T06vmvkbh_u:247: yadi dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā āgantukair upakleśair anutpanne (Mvbh 27) 'pi
T06vmvkbh_u:248: pratipakṣe na saṃkliṣṭā bhavet saṃkleśābhāvād ayatnata eva muktāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyuḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:249: athotpanne 'pi pratipakṣe na viśuddhā bhavet mokṣārtham ārambho niṣphalo bhavet /
T06vmvkbh_u:251: na kliṣṭā nāpi vākliṣṭā śuddhāśuddhā na caiva sā /
T06vmvkbh_u:257: evaṃ śūnyatāyā uddiṣṭaḥ prabhedaḥ sādhito bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:276: tatra vyāpi kleśajñeyāvaraṇaṃ bodhisatvagotrakāṇāṃ kaṃ sākalyāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:280: saṃsārādānatyāgāvaraṇaṃ bodhisatvagotrakāṇām apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇāvaraṇād ity etad yathāyogam ubhayeṣām āvaraṇam ākhyātaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:291: tena hi pratikūlam api pratighavastu upekṣituṃ na śaknoti /
T06vmvkbh_u:315: kin tad āvaraṇaṃ ke ca śubhādayaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:322: prakṛtyā caiva dauṣṭhulyaṃ kauśīdyaṃ ca pramāditā // II.6
T06vmvkbh_u:323: saktir bhave ca bhoge ca līnacittatvam eva ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:331: eṣāṃ śubhādīnāṃ kasya katy āvaraṇāni jñeyānīty āha /
T06vmvkbh_u:332: trīṇi trīṇi ca eteṣāṃ jñeyāny āvaraṇāni hi /
T06vmvkbh_u:341: tasyāḥ prajñāne trīṇy āvaraṇāni pratipattivaidhuryaṃ kujanavāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:350: pariṇates trīṇi yair anyatra cittaṃ pariṇāmayati /
T06vmvkbh_u:359: vaśitvasya trīṇi yair vibhutvaṃ na labhate [/] śrutavyasanaṃ dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyakarmaprabhavanāt
T06vmvkbh_u:363: tat punar etad āvaraṇaṃ śubhādau yatrārthe daśa kāraṇāni tadarthādhikāreṇa veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:366: sthitikāraṇaṃ tad yathā catvāra āhārāḥ satvānāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:375: tad yathā suvarṇakārādayaḥ suvarṇādīnāṃ kaṭakādibhāvena pariṇatau /
T06vmvkbh_u:384: sthityāvaraṇaṃ bodhau tasyā akopyatvād [/] dhṛtyāvaraṇaṃ samādāne bodhicittasyādhārabhūtatvād [/] abhivyaktyāvaraṇaṃ dhīmatve tasya
T06vmvkbh_u:388: viśleṣāvaraṇam anāvaraṇe tasyāvaraṇavisaṃyogatvāt [/] pariṇatyāvaraṇaṃ natau bodhau
T06vmvkbh_u:400: tasyāḥ punaḥ kuśalamūlotpatter bodhicittaṃ pratiṣṭhā [/] tasya bodhicittasya bodhisatva āśrayaḥ [/] tena punar utpāditabodhicittena kuśalamūlabalādhānaprāptena bodhisatvena viparyāsaṃ prahāya aviparyāsa utpāditavyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:403: prahīṇāvaraṇena sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni /
T06vmvkbh_u:405: tathānuttrastamānasena dharmeṣu guṇadarśinā pareṣāṃ te dharmā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyās [/] tataḥ sa bodhisatva evaṃ vicitraguṇabalādhānaprāptaḥ kṣipram (Mvbh 33) anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāptavān sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāpnotīty eṣo 'nukramaḥ (/) śubhādīnāṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:414: ṛddhipādeṣu samādher dvayahīnatā [/] paripūryā ca cchandavīryacittamīmānsānām anyatamavaikalyāt
T06vmvkbh_u:425: hānivṛddhyoś ca doṣāṇāṃ guṇānām avatāraṇe // II.12
T06vmvkbh_u:428: atra daśānāṃ pāramitānāṃ yasyāḥ pāramitāyāḥ yat phalaṃ tadāvaraṇena tasyā āvaraṇam udbhāvitaṃ bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:437: praṇidhānavaśena tadanukūlopapattiparigrahād [[] balapāramitāyās tasyaiva kuśalasya niyatīkaraṇāvaraṇaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:445: niṣparigrahatārthe ca santānābheda eva ca // II.14
T06vmvkbh_u:450: dharmadhātau daśavidhe sarvatragādyarthe yad akliṣṭam ajñānaṃ tad daśasu bodhisatvabhūmiṣv āvaraṇaṃ yathākramaṃ tadvipakṣatvāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:451: yad uta sarvatragārthe prathamayā hi bhūmyā dharmadhātoḥ sarvatragārthaṃ pratividhyati [/]
T06vmvkbh_u:453: dvitīyayāgrārthaṃ [/] yenāsyaivaṃ bhavati tasmāt tarhy asmābhiḥ samāne 'bhinirhāre
T06vmvkbh_u:456: yena dharmadhātuniṣyandasya śrutasyāgratāṃ viditvā tadarthaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrapramāṇāyām apy agnikhadāyām ātmānaṃ prakṣipet /
T06vmvkbh_u:457: caturthyā niṣparigrahatārthan tathā hi dharmatṛṣṇāpi vyāvartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:459: ṣaṣṭhyā niḥsaṃkleṣaviśuddhyarthaṃ pratītyasamutpāde (/) nāsti sa kaścid dharmo yaḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti prativedhāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:460: saptamyānānātvārthaṃ nirnimittatayā sūtrādidharmanimittanānātvāsamudācārād [/] aṣṭamyāhīnānadhikārtham anutpattikadharmakṣāntilābhāt saṃkleśe vyavadāne vā (Mvbh 36) kasyacid dharmasya hānivṛddhyadarśanāc [/] caturdhā vaśitā nirvikalpavaśitā
T06vmvkbh_u:461: kṣetrapariśuddhivaśitā jñānavaśitā karmavaśitā ca [/] tatra prathamadvitīyavaśitāśrayatvaṃ dharmadhātāv aṣṭamyaiva bhūmyā pratividdhati /
T06vmvkbh_u:467: sarvāṇy āvaraṇānīha yatkṣayān muktir iṣyate // II.17
T06vmvkbh_u:468: asya hi dvividhasyāvaraṇasya (/) kṣayāt sarvāvaraṇebhyo muktir iṣyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:477: hetvāvaraṇaṃ yac chubhādau daśavidhahetvarthādhikārāt i tatvapraveśāvaraṇaṃ yad bodhipakṣyeṣu
T06vmvkbh_u:485: phalahetumayan tatvaṃ sūkṣmaudārikam eva ca // III. 1
T06vmvkbh_u:488: ity etad daśavidhaṃ tatvaṃ yad uta mūlatatvaṃ lakṣaṇatatvaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:504: svabhāvas trividhaḥ parikalpitaḥ paratantraḥ pariniṣpannaś ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:508: asac ca nityaṃ sac cāpy atatvataḥ sadasattatvataś ceti svabhāvatraya iṣyate // III.3
T06vmvkbh_u:509: parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ nityam asad ity etat parikalpitasvabhāve tatvam aviparītatvāt [/] paratantralakṣaṇaṃ sac ca na ca tatvato bhrāntatvād ity etat paratantrasvabhāve tatvaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:510: pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ sadasattatvataś cety etat (/) pariniṣpannasvabhāve tatvaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:514: grāhyagrāhakayoś cāpi bhāvābhāve ca darśanaṃ // III.4
T06vmvkbh_u:515: yajjñānān na pravarteta tad dhi tatvasya lakṣaṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:516: pudgaladharmayoḥ samāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:518: grāhyagrāhakayoḥ samāropāpavādadarśanaṃ yasya jñānān na pravartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:522: etan mūlatatve lakṣaṇam aviparītaṃ lakṣaṇatatvam ity ucyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:524: aviparyāsatatvaṃ nityādiviparyāsapratipakṣeṇānityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmatā mūlatatve yathākramaṃ [/] kathaṃ ca tatrānityatāditā veditavyā /
T06vmvkbh_u:528: trayo hi svabhāvā mūlatatvaṃ [/] teṣu yathākramam
T06vmvkbh_u:529: asadartho hy anityārtha utpādavyayārthaḥ samalāmalatārthaś ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:535: abhāvaś cāpy atadbhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ śūnyatā matā /
T06vmvkbh_u:536: parikalpitalakṣaṇaṃ na kenacit prakāreṇāstīty abhāva evāsya śūnyatā paratantralakṣaṇaṃ tathā nāsti yathā parikalpyate na tu sarvathā nāstīti tasyātadbhāvaḥ (/) śūnyatā [/] pariniṣpannalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyatāsvabhāvam eveti
T06vmvkbh_u:538: alakṣaṇaṃ ca nairātmyaṃ tadvilakṣaṇam eva ca // III.7
T06vmvkbh_u:540: parikalpitasya svabhāvasya lakṣaṇam eva nāstīty alakṣaṇam evāsya nairātmyaṃ [/] paratantrasyāsti lakṣaṇaṃ na tu yathā parikalpyata iti tadvilakṣaṇam asya lakṣaṇan nairātmyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:541: pariniṣpannas tu svabhāvo nairātmyam eveti prakṛtir evāsya nairātmyam iti trividhe mūlatatve trividhānityatā paridīpitā asadarthānityatā utpādabhaṅgānityatā samalanirmalānityatā ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:542: trividhā duḥkhatā upādānaduḥkhatā lakṣaṇaduḥkhatā saṃbandhaduḥkhatā (Mvbh 40) ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:543: trividhā śūnyatā abhāvaśūnyatā atadbhāvaśūnyatā svabhāvaśūnyatā ca trividhaṃ nairātmyaṃ alakṣaṇanairātmyaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:546: phalahetumayan tatvaṃ tatraiva mūlatatve duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgasatyatvaṃ [/] kathaṃ trividhaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:548: duḥkhasatyam ato mataṃ trividhena samudayārthena samudayasatyaṃ [/] trividhaḥ samudayārthaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:549: vāsanātha samutthānam avisaṃyoga eva ca // III.8
T06vmvkbh_u:555: svabhāvānutpattir grāhyagrāhakayor anutpattir malaśāntidvayaṃ ca pratisaṃkhyānirodhatathatākhyam ity eṣa trividho nirodho yad uta svabhāvanirodho dvayanirodhaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:558: parijñāyāṃ prahāṇe ca prāptisākṣātkṛtāv ayaṃ [//] III.9
T06vmvkbh_u:561: parikalpitasya parijñāne paratantrasya parijñāne prahāṇe ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:562: pariniṣpannasya parijñāne prāptisākṣātkaraṇe ca evam atra parijñāprahāṇasākṣātkriyāyāṃ mārgasatyavyavasthānam iti veditavyaṃ [/]
T06vmvkbh_u:564: audārikasūkṣmatatvaṃ punaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthasatyaṃ tan mūlatatve kathaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:575: arthaparamārthas tathatā paramasya jñānasyārtha iti kṛtvā /
T06vmvkbh_u:576: prāptiparamārtho nirvāṇaṃ paramo 'rtha iti kṛtvā pratipattiparamārtho
T06vmvkbh_u:577: mārgaḥ paramo 'syārtha iti kṛtvā [/] katham asaṃskṛtaṃ ca (/) saṃskṛtaṃ ca (/) pariniṣpannaḥ (/) svabhāva ucyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:588: yasmin vastuni saṃketasaṃstavānupraviṣṭayā buddhyā sarveṣāṃ laukikānāṃ darśanatulyatā bhavati
T06vmvkbh_u:589: pṛthivy eveyaṃ nāgnī rūpam evedaṃ na śabda ity evamādi /
T06vmvkbh_u:591: yat satāṃ yuktārthapaṇḍitānāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ pramāṇatrayaṃ niśrityopapattisādhanayuktyā prasiddhaṃ vastu /
T06vmvkbh_u:596: viśuddhigocaraṃ dvedhā ekasmād eva kīrtitaṃ // III.12
T06vmvkbh_u:597: pariniṣpannād eva svabhāvān na hy anyasvabhāvo viśuddhijñānadvayagocaro bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:601: yathāyogaṃ pañca vastūny ārabhya nimittavikalpayoḥ paratantreṇa (Mvbh 43)
T06vmvkbh_u:614: anavarāgreṣv eti saṃsāraḥ tathatācittasaṃkleśāt satvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti sarvaṃ duḥkhādisatyaṃ ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ) yaiva ca sandhinirmocanasūtre saptavidhā tathatā nirdiṣṭā /
T06vmvkbh_u:632: yasya pratipakṣeṇa daśavidhaṃ kauśalyaṃ yad utaikatvagrāho hetutvagrāho bhoktṛtvagrāhaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:641: trividhaṃ rūpaṃ parikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ yo rūpasya parikalpitaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:642: vikalpitaṃ rūpaṃ yo rūpasya paratantraḥ (/) svabhāvas tatra hi
T06vmvkbh_u:645: yathā rūpam evaṃ vedanādayaḥ skandhāḥ dhātvāyatanādayaś ca yojyāḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:646: evan triṣu svabhāveṣu skandhādīnām antarbhāvād daśavidhaṃ kauśalyatatvaṃ mūlatatva eva draṣṭavyaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:647: uktam idaṃ yathā daśavidhātmadarśanapratipakṣeṇa skandhādikauśalyaṃ [/] skandhādyarthas tu noktaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:652: āditas tāvat skandhās te trividhenārthena veditavyāḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:653: anekatvārthena yat kiñcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam iti vistaraḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:656: rāśyartho hi skandhārtha evaṃ ca loke rāśyartho dṛṣṭa iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:670: tatra hetu sa nāropaḥ saṃskārādīnāṃ viṣamahetukalpanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:671: (Mvbh 46) hetvapavādo nirhetukatvakalpanāt phalasamāropaḥ sātmakānāṃ saṃskārādīnām avidyādipratyayapravṛttikalpanāt
T06vmvkbh_u:672: phalāpavādo na santy avidyādipratyayāḥ saṃskārādaya iti kalpanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:673: kriyāsamāropo 'vidyādīnāṃ saṃskārādyutpattau vyāpārakalpanāt kriyāpavādo niḥsāmarthyakalpanāt tadabhāvād asamāropānapavādo veditavyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:678: tatrāniṣṭe pāratantryaṃ duścaritenānicchato 'pi durgatigamanād iṣṭe pāratantryaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:680: viśuddhau pāratantryaṃ pañca nivaraṇāny aprahāya yāvat saptabodhyaṅgāny abhāvayitvā duḥkhasyāntākaraṇāt samotpattau pāratantryaṃ dvayor apūrvācaramayos tathāgatayoś cakravartinoś caikasmin lokadhātāv anutpādād ādhipatye pāratantryaṃ striyāś cakravartitvādyakaraṇāt saṃprāptau pāratantryaṃ striyāḥ pratyekānuttarabodhyanabhisaṃbodhāt samudācāre pāratantryaṃ dṛṣṭisaṃpannasya vadhādyupakramāsamudācārāt pṛthagjanasya ca samudācārād vistareṇa bahudhātukasūtrānusārād anugantavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:685: grahaṇārthena yāvad viśuddhidvayārthena teṣu tadādhipatyād rūpādiviṣayagrahaṇe hi cakṣurādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇām ādhipatyaṃ sthāne jīvitendriyasya tadādhipatyenāmaraṇāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:686: kulasandhāne strīpuruṣendriyayor apatyaprasavādhipatyād upabhoge vedanendriyāṇāṃ kuśalākuśalakarmaphalopabhogāt
T06vmvkbh_u:697: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ vedanāsanimittārthena yat kiñcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti kṛtvā vedanānimittaṃ punar vedanāsthānīyā dharmā veditavyāḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:708: tenaiva svayam aśrutvā parato niryāṇārthena pratyekabuddhayānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:709: avikalpena jñānena svayaṃ niryāṇārthena mahāyānaṃ veditavyaṃ //
T06vmvkbh_u:712: nimittāt praśamāt sārthāt paścimaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ // III.22
T06vmvkbh_u:713: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ tatra saprajñaptir nāmakāyādayaḥ hetur bījasaṃgṛhītam ālayavijñānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:716: etat saprajñaptisahetukaṃ nimittaṃ sasaṃprayogaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:718: udgrahaḥ pañcavijñānakāyāḥ vikalpo manovijñānaṃ (/) tasya vikalpakatvād asaṃskṛtaṃ punaḥ praśamaś ca nirodhaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:719: / praśamārthaś ca tathatā tatra praśamo nirodho mārgaś ca yaś ca praśamo yena ceti kṛtvā praśamārthaḥ tathatā praśamasyārtha iti kṛtvā tathatāyā
T06vmvkbh_u:722: ity etenārthena skandhādiṣu jñānaṃ skandhādikauśalyaṃ veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:727: dṛśyatatvaṃ ca tatrādarśatatvaṃ mūlatatvaṃ tatra śeṣāṇāṃ darśanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:751: tayā sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastv āryā duḥkhataḥ paśyantīti /
T06vmvkbh_u:753: ātmābhiniveśavastu cittaṃ tatparīkṣayā nirodhasatyam avataraty ātmocchedabhayāpagamāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:755: mārgasatyam avataraty ataḥ (/) ādau catuḥsatyāvatārāya smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā
T06vmvkbh_u:759: parijñāte vipakṣe ca pratipakṣe ca sarvathā /
T06vmvkbh_u:761: smṛtyupasthānabhāvanayā vipakṣe pratipakṣe ca sarvaprakāraṃ parijñāte vipakṣāpagamāya pratipakṣopagamāya ca vīryañ caturdhā saṃpravartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:762: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāyeti vistaraḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:767: tasyāṃ tadapāyāyavīryabhāvanāyāṃ cittasthiteḥ (/) karmaṇyatā catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ sarvārthasamṛddhihetutvāt sthitir atra cittasthitiḥ samādhir
T06vmvkbh_u:774: asaṃskāro 'tha saṃskāraḥ pañca doṣā ime matāḥ // IV.4
T06vmvkbh_u:779: eṣāṃ prahāṇāya katham aṣṭau prahāṇasaṃskārā vyavasthāpyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:780: catvāraḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya cchandavyāyāmaśraddhāprasrabdhayas te punar yathākramaṃ veditavyāḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:781: āśrayo 'thāśritas tasya nimittaṃ phalam eva ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:783: āśrito vyāyāmas tasyāśrayasya cchandasya nimittaṃ śraddhā saṃpratyaye (/) saty abhilāṣāt tasyāśritasya vyāyāmasya phalaṃ prasrabdhir ārabdhavīryasya samādhiviśeṣādhigamāc (Mvbh 52) cheṣāś catvāraḥ prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyacetanopekṣāś caturṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:784: yathāsaṃkhyaṃ pratipakṣās te punaḥ smṛtyādayo veditavyā yathākramaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:792: ṛddhipādānām anantaraṃ pañcendriyāṇi śraddhādīni teṣāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:796: ṛddhipādaiḥ karmaṇyacittasyāropite mokṣabhāgīye kuśalamūle cchandādhipatyataḥ prayogādhipatyataḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:802: tāny eva śraddhādīni balavanti balānīty ucyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:803: teṣāṃ punar balavatvaṃ vipakṣasya hi saṃlekhad /
T06vmvkbh_u:805: yadā tāny aśraddhādibhir vipakṣair na vyavakīryante /
T06vmvkbh_u:812: avaropitamokṣabhāgīyasyendriyāṇy uktāny atha nirvedhabhāgīyāni kim indriyāvasthāyāṃ veditavyāny āhosvid balāvasthāyāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:813: dvau dvau nirvedhabhāgīyāv indriyāṇi balāni ca // IV.7
T06vmvkbh_u:819: caturtham anuśaṃsāṅgan niḥkleśāṅgaṃ tridhā mataṃ // IV.8
T06vmvkbh_u:840: parasaṃbhāvanāṅgaṃ tridhā samyagvākkarmāntājīvās tair hi yathākramaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:841: dṛṣṭau śīle 'tha saṃlekhe paravijñaptir iṣyate // IV.10
T06vmvkbh_u:842: tasya samyagvācā kathāsāṃkathyaviniścayena prajñāyāṃ saṃbhāvanā bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:850: vibhutvavipakṣaś ca vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhāravibandhaḥ tatra prathamasya samyagvyāyāmaḥ pratipakṣas tena mārgabhāvanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:857: viparyastāpi aviparyāsānukūlāviparyastā viparyāsānubandhā aviparyastā viparyāsaniranubandhā ca yathākramaṃ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāśaikṣāvasthāsu /
T06vmvkbh_u:860: bodhisatvānāṃ svaparasāntānikāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhā anityādibhir ākāraiḥ kāyādīn manasikurvanti
T06vmvkbh_u:862: śrāvakapratyekabuddhāḥ smṛtyupasthānādīni bhāvayanti yāvad eva kāyādīnāṃ visaṃyogāya /
T06vmvkbh_u:873: adhimuktau praveśe ca niryāṇe vyākṛtāv api /
T06vmvkbh_u:876: tatra hetvavasthā yā gotrasthasya pudgalasyāvatārāvasthā utpāditabodhicittasya prayogāvasthā cittotpādād ūrdham aprāpte phale /
T06vmvkbh_u:882: anuttarāvasthā buddhasya tata ūrdham avasthābhāvād adhimuktyavasthā bodhisatvānāṃ sarvasyām adhimukticaryābhūmau /
T06vmvkbh_u:883: praveśāvasthā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau niryāṇāvasthā taduttarāsu ṣaṭsu bhūmiṣu /
T06vmvkbh_u:884: vyākaraṇāvasthā aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau kathikatvāvasthā navamyām abhiṣekāvasthā daśamyāṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:890: aśuddhāśuddhaśuddhā ca viśuddhā ca yathārhataḥ // IV.15
T06vmvkbh_u:891: tatrāśuddhāvasthā hetvavasthām upādāya yāvat prayogād aśuddhaśuddhāvasthā
T06vmvkbh_u:895: ato 'vasthāprabhedād yathāyogaṃ pudgalānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ (/) veditavyam ayaṃ gotrastho 'yam avatīrṇa ity evamādi /
T06vmvkbh_u:900: rucir vṛddhir viśuddhiś ca phalam etad yathākramaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:907: vipākaphalam adhipatiphalan niṣyandaphalaṃ puruṣakāraphalaṃ visaṃyogaphalañ ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:908: uttarottaram ādyañ ca tadabhyāsāt samāptitaḥ // IV.17
T06vmvkbh_u:910: uttarānuttaratvāc ca phalam anyat samāsataḥ // IV.18
T06vmvkbh_u:911: uttarottaraphalaṃ gotrāc cittotpāda ity evamādi paraṃparayā veditavyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:918: visaṃyogaphalaṃ nirodhasākṣātkriyā abhyāsaphalaṃ samāptiphalaṃ ca kleśavisaṃyogaḥ (Mvbh
T06vmvkbh_u:922: etāni catvāri abhyāsasamāptiphalaprabheda eva etad anyat phalaṃ samāsanirdeśato vyāsatas tv aparimāṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:929: sottarā bhāvanā niruttarā ca bhāvanā yālambanamanaskāraprāptiviśiṣṭā // avasthānāṃ piṇḍārthaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:943: uddeśataḥ uttarottaraphalādīni catvāri nirdeśataḥ ānukūlyaphalādini ṣaṭ /
T06vmvkbh_u:950: ānuttaryaṃ prapattau hi punar ālambane mataṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:952: trividham ānuttaryaṃ mahāyāne yenaitad anuttaraṃ yānaṃ pratipattyānuttaryaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:961: ity eṣā ṣaḍvidhā pratipattir yad uta paramā pratipattiḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:970: nairantaryam akṛcchratvaṃ vittatvaṃ ca parigrahaḥ // V.3
T06vmvkbh_u:973: yad utaudāryaparamatā āyatatvaparamatā adhikāraparamatā akṣayatvaparamatā nairantaryaparamatā
T06vmvkbh_u:979: akṣayatvaparamatā mahābodhipariṇāmanayātyantam aparyādānān nairantaryaparamatātmaparasamatādhimokṣāt sarvasatvadānādibhiḥ pāramitāparipūraṇād akṛcchratvaparamatānumodanāmātreṇa paradānādīnāṃparamitāparipūraṇāt vittatvaparamatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:981: ārambhaparamatādhimukticaryābhūmāv adhimātrāyāṃ kṣāntau pratilambhaparamatā prathamāyāṃ bhūmau
T06vmvkbh_u:986: tataś ca paramārthena daśa pāramitā matāḥ // V.4
T06vmvkbh_u:987: yata eṣā dvādaśavidhā paramatā etāsu saṃvidyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:991: dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣamā vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā upāyatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:992: praṇidhānaṃ balaṃ jñānam etāḥ pāramitā daśeti // V.5
T06vmvkbh_u:994: anugraho 'vighātaś ca karma tasya ca marṣaṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:996: akṣayatvaṃ sadā vṛttir niyataṃ bhogapācane // V.6
T06vmvkbh_u:1006: sarvajanmasu buddhotpādārāgaṇato dānādiṣu sadā pravartate balapāramitayā pratisaṃkhyānabhāvanābalābhyāṃ niyataṃ dānādiṣu pravartate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1016: dānādīny adhikṛtya yathāprajñaptānāṃ sūtrādidharmāṇāṃ mahāyāne manasikaraṇam abhīkṣṇaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayyā prajñayā manasikārapratipattiḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1017: sā triprakārayā prajñayā manasikriyā kaṃ guṇaṃkaroti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1022: saṃyuktā dharmacaritaiḥ sā jñeyā daśabhiḥ punaḥ // V.8
T06vmvkbh_u:1024: daśabhir dharmacaritaiḥ parigṛhītā veditavyā katamad daśadhā dharmacaritaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1026: prakāśanātha svādhyāyaś cintanā bhāvanā ca tat // V.9
T06vmvkbh_u:1027: mahāyānasya lekhanaṃ pūjanaṃ parebhyo dānaṃ pareṇa vācyamānasya śravaṇaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1034: kasmān mahāyāna eva dharmacaritam atyarthaṃ mahāphalan deśyate sūtreṣu na punaḥ śrāvakayāne
T06vmvkbh_u:1055: sa eṣa kiṃlakṣaṇo veditavya ity ata āha /
T06vmvkbh_u:1059: hīnacittaṃca vikṣepaḥ parijñeyo hi dhīmatā // V.12
T06vmvkbh_u:1060: ity evaṃlakṣaṇaḥ ṣaḍvidho vikṣepo yo bodhisatvena parijñeyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1061: tatra vyutthānaṃ samādhitaḥ pañcabhir vijñānakāyaiḥ prakṛtivikṣepaḥ viṣaye visāro bahirdhāvikṣepaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:1075: saṃyogāt saṃstavāc caiva viyogād apy asaṃstavāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1076: arthasatvam asatvañ ca vyañjane so 'viparyayaḥ /] V.14
T06vmvkbh_u:1077: saṃyoge sati vyañjanānām avicchinnoccāraṇatayā asya cedaṃ nāmeti saṃstavāt sārthakatvaṃ viparyayān nirarthakatvam iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1081: dvayena pratibhāsatvaṃ tathā cāvidyamānatā j arthe sa cāviparyāsaḥ sadasatvena varjitaḥ //
T06vmvkbh_u:1086: arthe yad darśanaṃ sa tatrāviparyāsaḥ arthasya satvena varjito grāhyagrāhakābhāvād asatvena varjitaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1088: tajjalpabhāvito jalpamanaskāras tadāśrayaḥ manaskāre 'viparyāso dvayaprakhyānakāraṇe // V.16
T06vmvkbh_u:1089: grāhyagrāhakajalpaparibhāvito jalpamanaskāras tasya grāhyagrāhakavikalpasyāśrayo bhavatīty ayaṃ manaskāre 'viparyāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1090: katamasmin manaskāre grāhyagrāhakasaṃprakhyānakāraṇe sa hy asau jalpamanaskāro 'bhilāpasaṃjñāparibhāvitatvāt grāhyagrāhakavikalpāśrayo veditavyaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1091: māyādivad asatvañ ca satvaṃ cārthasya tan mataṃ [/]
T06vmvkbh_u:1093: yat tad arthasyāsatvaṃ satvaṃ cānantaram uktaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1094: tan māyādivan mataṃ yathā māyā na hastyādibhāvenāsti na ca naivāsti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1096: evam artho 'pi na cāsti yathā saṃprakhyāti grāhyagrāhakatvena na ca naivāsti tadbhrāntimātrāstitvāt
T06vmvkbh_u:1097: ādiśabdena marīcisvapnodakacandrādayo dṛṣṭāntā yathāyogaṃ veditavyā iti yan māyādyupamārthe darśanād avisāraṃ cetasaḥ paśyati so 'visāre 'viparyāsas tena bhāvābhāvayoś cittasyāvisaraṇāt (Mvbh 67)
T06vmvkbh_u:1101: yad idaṃ cakṣūrūpaṃ yāvan manodharmā iti yaj jñānaṃ sarvavikalpānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ayaṃ svalakṣaṇe 'viparyāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1104: saṃvṛtyā tu nedaṃ nāmamātram iti gṛhyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1106: sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tasmāt sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.19
T06vmvkbh_u:1107: na hi dharmanairātmyena vinā kaścid dharmo vidyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1108: tasmād dharmadhātuḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1112: tadaśuddhir viśuddhiś ca sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.20
T06vmvkbh_u:1113: viparyastasmanaskārāprahāṇan tasya dharmadhātor aviśuddhis tatprahāṇaṃ viśuddhir iti yad evaṃjñānam ayam aviśuddhau viśuddhau cāviparyāso yathākramaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1115: dvayasyāgantukatvaṃ hi sa ca tatrāviparyayaḥ // V.21
T06vmvkbh_u:1118: dvayam apy etad āgantukam aviśuddhiru viśuddhiś ca paścād iti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1121: saṃkleśaś ca viśuddhiś ca dharmapudgalayor na hi /
T06vmvkbh_u:1123: na hi pudgalasya saṃkleśo na viśuddhir nāpi dharmasya /
T06vmvkbh_u:1125: 'sti na dharmo yataś ca na kasyacit saṃkleśo na vyavadānaṃ ato na saṃkleśapakṣe kasyacid dhāniḥ na vyavadānapakse kasyacid viśeṣaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1126: yatas trāso vā syād unnatir vety ayam atrāse 'nunnatau cāviparyāsaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1128: ete ca daśāviparyāsā daśasu vajrapadeṣu yathākramaṃ yojayitavyāḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1131: āśrayo māyopamatā avikalpanatā prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1141: ta eva avikalpanato yena ca na vikalpayati nirvikalpena jñānena yac ca na vikalpayati prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:1143: yad uta tribhiḥ svabhāvair avikalpanatayā ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1146: yady ete parikalpitaparatantralakṣaṇā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:1151: yathā māyākṛtaṃ na vidyata upalabhyate ca yadi prakṛtiprabhāsvaratā dharmāṇāṃ tat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃkleśaḥ paścād vyavadānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1156: yady aprameyabuddhotpāde saty aprameyāṇāṃ satvānāṃ kleśāpaśamaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1157: tat kathaṃ na saṃsārasamucchedo na nirvāṇavṛddhir bhavati /
T06vmvkbh_u:1161: yatra yā ca yato bhrāntir abhrāntir yā ca yatra ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1162: bhrāntyabhrāntiphale caiva paryantaś ca tayor iti //
T06vmvkbh_u:1164: akalpanā prakṛtyā ca bhāsvaratvaṃ sadaiva hi //
T06vmvkbh_u:1169: antadvayavarjane pratipattiḥ katamā yā ratnakūṭe madhyamā pratipattir upadiṣṭā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1175: vikalpadvayatāntaś ca sa ca saptavidho mataḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1182: ekatvam ity antaḥ tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
T06vmvkbh_u:1184: yāvan na mānavapratyavekṣā ātmadarśane hi jīvas tac charīraṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1189: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yā rūpādīnāṃ na nityapratyavekṣā nānityapratyavekṣā
T06vmvkbh_u:1190: ātmeti pudgalasamāropāntaḥ nairātmyam ity apavādāntaḥ prajñaptisato 'py apavādāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1191: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad ātmanairātmyayor madhyaṃ nirvikalpaṃ jñānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1192: bhūtaṃ cittam iti dharmasamāropāntaḥ abhūtam ity apavādāntaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1193: tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yatra na cittaṃ na cetanā na mano na vijñānaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1195: kuśalādayo vyavadānam iti pratipakṣāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yo 'syāntadvayasyānupagamo 'nudāhāro 'pravyāhāraḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1196: astīti śāśvatāntas tayor eva pudgaladharmayor nāstīty ucchedāntas tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad yad anayor dvayor antayor madhyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1198: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca tatpratipakṣaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1199: yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ cety antas tannirodho grāhyo grāhako vety anto yena mārgeṇa tan nirudhyate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1200: evaṃ grāhyagrāhakānto (Mvbh 71) dvidhā kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣabhedena tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etad iti vistareṇa vidyāvidyādīnāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvābhāvāt trividhaḥ saṃkleśaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1206: yasya pratipakṣo jñānaśūnyatā jñānānimittaṃ jñānāpraṇihitaṃ ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1211: punarbhavaprabandhaś ca yasya pratipakṣo jñānājātiḥ jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
T06vmvkbh_u:1214: jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmā etena trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyante
T06vmvkbh_u:1215: prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt tena yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti kalpayaty ayam antaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1218: yan na śūnyatayā dharmāñ chūnyāṃ karoti /
T06vmvkbh_u:1219: api tu dharmā eva śūnyā ity evamādi /
T06vmvkbh_u:1220: aparaḥ saptavidho vikalpadvayāntas tad yathā bhāve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ/
T06vmvkbh_u:1221: abhāve 'pi pudgalo 'sti yasya vināśāya śūnyatā (Mvbh 72) nairātmyam api vā
T06vmvkbh_u:1223: tad etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham iyaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
T06vmvkbh_u:1224: na khalu pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā api tu śūnyataiva śūnyā pūrvāntaśūnyatā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1228: praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanād etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham ākāśadṛṣṭāntaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:1229: trāsye 'pi vikalpo 'ntas tataś ca trāsyād bhaye 'pi
T06vmvkbh_u:1232: pūrvako dṛṣṭāntaḥ śrāvakān ārabhyāyaṃ tu bodhisatvān /
T06vmvkbh_u:1233: grāhye 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ grāhake 'pi etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ māyākāradṛṣṭāntaḥ
T06vmvkbh_u:1237: arthābhāve vijñaptyasaṃbhavād ity etad atra sādharmyaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1238: samyaktve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ mithyātve 'pi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena kalpayato mithyātvena vā etasyāntadvayasya parivarjanārthaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1241: jātaś ca tad eva kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahaty evam asamyaktvalakṣaṇāyā yathābhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ samyaktvalakṣaṇam āryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vibhāvayatīty etad atra sādharmyaṃ na cāsamyaktvalakṣaṇāpi bhūtapratyavekṣā mithyātvalakṣaṇā samyaktvānukūlyāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1243: avyāpṛtāv api jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1246: ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā
T06vmvkbh_u:1247: kalpayati saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas tailapradyotadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1252: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu /
T06vmvkbh_u:1253: yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitātiriktatarā sā tatra viśiṣṭā sarvāsu ca sarvatra samudāgacchatīty aviśiṣṭā /
T06vmvkbh_u:1261: pragamaḥ praśaṭhatvaṃ ca prakarṣālambanaṃ mataṃ // V.28
T06vmvkbh_u:1264: yad uta dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmadhātvālambanaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:1271: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmā vyavasthāpyante /
T06vmvkbh_u:1272: dvitīyan tathatā tṛtīyacaturthe te eva yathākramaṃ dharmadhātuprativedhena pāramitādidharmādhigamāt
T06vmvkbh_u:1281: ekādaśam aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau dvādaśaṃ navamyādibhūmitraye tad eva hi prathamadvayaṃ /
T06vmvkbh_u:1282: tasyān tasyām avasthāyāṃ tattadālambanaṃ nāma labhate /
T06vmvkbh_u:1302: ity etac chāstraṃ madhyavibhāgaṃ hi madhyamāpratipatprakāśanāt madhyāntavibhāgam apy etan madhyasyāntayoś ca prakāśanāt /
T06vmvkbh_u:1320: yathā yena prakāreṇāvikṣepapariṇatā ca śamathabhāvanayā aviparyāsapariṇatā ca vipaśyanābhāvanayā/ yadarthaṃ ca madhyamayā
T06vmvkbh_u:1337: // vyākhyām imām upanibadhya yad asti puṇyaṃ
T06vmvkbh_u:1339: jñānodayāya ca yato 'bhyudayaṃ mahāntaṃ bodhitrayaṃ ca na cirāj jagad aśnuvīta //
